inlineContent.text: The scanning result is visualized using a polygonal bezier path.
This class cannot be instanced from a storyboard.
Instead it is installing itself as a child view controller onto a given parent view controller.
, it benefits from all its advantages, e.g. zooming, view finder, and energy management.

abstract.text: A UIViewController subclass to show a camera screen and run a user guiding document scanner.
The auto-snapping mode.
The filters to be applied to the snapped document image.
Whether the polygon-displaying layer is hidden or not.
The configuration for the polygon displayed over the scanned document when the document detection status is not
The delegate protocol for the
class.
Limits the maximum size of the document image.
A
subclass to display a view finder with colored background and transparent cutout with the given aspect ratio.
Sets a custom snapping button. If not
, it replaces the default snapping button.
Captures the currently scanned document image, as if the user would press the shutter button or the auto-snapping fires.
The font size of the user guidance label.
The  delegate protocol for
The configuration for the progress polygon displayed over the scanned document when the document is being scanned in auto snapping mode.
The delegate of the receiver.
The sensitivity of auto-snapping. Values are clamped to the range 0.0 - 1.0.
Whether the receiver is currently animating a captured document or not. Readonly.
Version: 7.1.4
Installs the receiver as child view controller onto the parent view controllers view using its entire bounds area.
A multicast-observer protocol that informs its observers about state changes of a camera session.
The scaling factor for captured images. Values are clamped to the range 0.0 - 1.0.
Initializes an instance of this class with the default configuration.
Sets the configuration of the receiver.
The default snap button.
An acceptable document was detected.
If set to
the scanning status label is always shown, if its text is non-empty.
Otherwise it is hidden.
Whether the document capturing is animated or not.
Determines whether the document should be cropped automatically after a manual snap or not.
If set to
the polygon layer is always shown, if there was a document polygon scanned.
Otherwise it is hidden.
A UIViewController subclass to show a camera screen and run a user guiding document scanner.
A highly customizable camera view controller that delivers a basic camera functionality along with video
frame extraction and preprocessing, orientation correction and still image capturing.
Whether the snap button is hidden or not.
The configuration object for the document scanning status text.
Installs the receiver as child view controller onto the parent view controllers view using its entire bounds area.
The minimum delay in seconds between two consecutive automatic image captures.
Returns a copy of the receivers current configuration.
